top.title: Secure, reliable cross-platform development for enterprise teams.
top.text: Take on mobile projects with peace of mind, knowing the native features, security, and performance you need will just work - now and in the future.

background.alt: raised platforms with app and company icons

title.text: Unlock the full Ionic ecosystem of solutions.

native.subtext: Extend the value of your Capacitor project with enterprise-grade software and services for every phase of development.

native__list.title: Build with confidence
native__list.text: Enjoy peace of mind knowing the native plugins you depend on are built and maintained by a team you can trust, backed by mission-critical support.

native__list.title: Protect your users & data
native__list.text: Give your users the best possible on-device security, with advanced biometric authentication and the latest in secure storage.

native__list.title: Accelerate your mobile projects
native__list.text: Get to market faster with a suite of cloud services to help you streamline and automate building, publishing, and updating your Capacitor projects.

text.text: Ship cross-platform mobile apps 10X faster. We wrote a free guide on when and why to use Capacitor to build cross-platform apps.

book.alt: book cover with title reading "Building Cross-platform Apps with Capacitor"

title.text: Native plugins & APIs you can rely on.

plugins.subtext: Native features maintained by our team of experts. Active subscribers get ongoing updates to supported plugins, to keep pace with mobile OS and API changes, and evolving device standards.

image.alt: wheel of app icons around capacitor logo

title.text: Front-to back app security and trust.

subtext.text: Deliver the best possible frontend security to protect users and data, with plug-and-play security solutions like Identity Vault, Auth Connect, and Offline Storage.

image.alt: identity vault, auth connect, and offline storage icons around capacitor logo

title.text: Easy app publishing and live updates.

subtext.text: Publish Capacitor projects directly from the cloud using Appflow, our mobile CI/CD solution that makes building, publishing and updating native apps a breeze.

image.alt: Appflow logo surrounded by app icons

support_guidance.title: Mission-critical support
support_guidance.text: Guaranteed response SLAs throughout the app lifecycle. Our professional support team is on-hand to help you troubleshoot and address issues occuring at the native layer.

support_guidance.title: Expert native guidance
support_guidance.text: Our team of experienced development experts will work with your teams to define a native strategy that fits your unique goals and challenges. Weâ€™re here to help ensure your success.

title.text: Everything you need. Build native-powered apps with ease.

features.subtext: A full library of native plugins, actively maintained. Includes the most commonly accessed native features used in enterprise app development, plus custom development options to address any native device requirements.

features__list.title: Common Device Features
features__list.text: Everything you need to deliver the core functionality your users expect, from essentials like camera and geolocation, to payments and splash screen.

features__list.title: Guaranteed SLA
features__list.text: Timely support and troubleshooting when you need it most. Get expert help directly from the Ionic team with guaranteed response times.

features__list.title: Regular Release Cycles
features__list.text: A release timeline you can count on, as opposed to a community maintainers schedule. Think days instead of months or years.

features__list.title: Critical Security Updates & Fixes
features__list.text: Keep your users protected with ongoing security updates and fixes that keep pace with OS releases, patches, and known vulnerabilities.

features__list.title: Guidance & Expertise
features__list.text: Ensure your team is utilizing best practices when adding native functionality, helping you to meet your deadlines while avoiding costly tech debt.

paragraph_1.text: Ionic's ecosystem of enterprise-grade solutions are changing how app development is done in the enterprise.

paragraph_2.text: See how Capacitor and Ionic are using the power of the web to build, secure, and deliver enterprise-grade apps in less time.
